ygData.subject: Re: Middel Earth Online (was) Group damage OT
ygData.msgSnippet: ...  What I heard was that Sierra canned the original concept of a low-magic, harsh death world in-line with the Tolkien books. And instead
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 28 Sep 1999, Daniel P. Sniderman wrote:
>
> That's not accurate - Sierra Online IS going through re-structuring and are
> closing the office where the team that was developing it - they claim that
> they are going to re-staff it and product them game. Don't hold your breath
> however. The following is from their website:

<Rumor alert!>

What I heard was that Sierra canned the original concept of a
low-magic, harsh death world in-line with the Tolkien books.
And instead they're shooting for a high-magic lenient-death
world - i.e. a UO/EQ/AC clone. This decision has supposedly
led to the entire original design staff opting not to stay
aboard.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
